=*.: GoodID Offers Summary :.*


*- People -*
  {{ $json.data[1]['All RT Members'] }} Total RedTent Pool Members ({{ $if($json.data[1]['All RT Members'] >= $json.data[0]['All RT Members'], '+','') }}{{ ((parseInt($json.data[1]['All RT Members']) - parseInt($json.data[0]['All RT Members']))/ parseInt($json.data[0]['All RT Members'])*100).toFixed(1)+'%'}} from last week)
    {{ $json.data[1]['RT All Claims Last 30'] }} Monthly Active RedTent Pool Members ({{ $if($json.data[1]['RT All Claims Last 30'] >= $json.data[0]['RT All Claims Last 30'], '+','') }}{{ ((parseInt($json.data[1]['RT All Claims Last 30']) - parseInt($json.data[0]['RT All Claims Last 30']))/ parseInt($json.data[0]['RT All Claims Last 30'])*100).toFixed(1)+'%'}} from last week)
      {{ $json.data[1]['Colombia RT Members'] }} Members in Colombia Pool ({{ $if($json.data[1]['Colombia RT Members'] >= $json.data[0]['Colombia RT Members'], '+','') }}{{ ((parseInt($json.data[1]['Colombia RT Members']) - parseInt($json.data[0]['Colombia RT Members']))/ parseInt($json.data[0]['Colombia RT Members'])*100).toFixed(1)+'%'}} from last week)
      {{ $json.data[1]['Nigeria RT Members'] }} Members in Nigeria Pool ({{ $if($json.data[1]['Nigeria RT Members'] >= $json.data[0]['Nigeria RT Members'], '+','') }}{{ ((parseInt($json.data[1]['Nigeria RT Members']) - parseInt($json.data[0]['Nigeria RT Members']))/ parseInt($json.data[0]['Nigeria RT Members'])*100).toFixed(1)+'%'}} from last week)


*- Claim -*

	*- All Time*
		{{ $json.data[1]['RT All Claims AT'] }} RedTent Claims AT ({{ $if($json.data[1]['RT All Claims AT'] >= $json.data[0]['RT All Claims AT'], '+','') }}{{ ((parseInt($json.data[1]['RT All Claims AT']) - parseInt($json.data[0]['RT All Claims AT']))/ parseInt($json.data[0]['RT All Claims AT'])*100).toFixed(1)+'%'}} from last week)
		  {{ $json.data[1]['RT Colombia Claims AT'] }} Colombia Claims AT ({{ $if($json.data[1]['RT Colombia Claims AT'] >= $json.data[0]['RT Colombia Claims AT'], '+','') }}{{ ((parseInt($json.data[1]['RT Colombia Claims AT']) - parseInt($json.data[0]['RT Colombia Claims AT']))/ parseInt($json.data[0]['RT Colombia Claims AT'])*100).toFixed(1)+'%'}} from last week)
		  {{ $json.data[1]['RT Nigeria Claims AT'] }} Nigeria Claims AT ({{ $if($json.data[1]['RT Nigeria Claims AT'] >= $json.data[0]['RT Nigeria Claims AT'], '+','') }}{{ ((parseInt($json.data[1]['RT Nigeria Claims AT']) - parseInt($json.data[0]['RT Nigeria Claims AT']))/ parseInt($json.data[0]['RT Nigeria Claims AT'])*100).toFixed(1)+'%'}} from last week)
	  

	*- Last 7 days*  
		{{ $json.data[1]['RT Avg Claim count per user Last 7'] }} Average Claim count per user this week  ({{ $if($json.data[1]['RT Avg Claim count per user Last 7'] >= $json.data[0]['RT Avg Claim count per user Last 7'], '+','') }}{{ (($json.data[1]['RT Avg Claim count per user Last 7'] - $json.data[0]['RT Avg Claim count per user Last 7'])/$json.data[0]['RT Avg Claim count per user Last 7']*100).toFixed(1)+'%' }} from last week)
	  
		{{ $json.data[1]['RT All Claims Last 7'] }} RedTent Claims Last 7 days  ({{ $if($json.data[1]['RT All Claims Last 7'] >= $json.data[0]['RT All Claims Last 7'], '+','') }}{{ ((parseInt($json.data[1]['RT All Claims Last 7']) - parseInt($json.data[0]['RT All Claims Last 7']))/ parseInt($json.data[0]['RT All Claims Last 7'])*100).toFixed(1)+'%'}} from last week)	  
			{{ $json.data[1]['RT Colombia Claims Last 7'] }} Colombia Claims Last 7 days ({{ $if($json.data[1]['RT Colombia Claims Last 7'] >= $json.data[0]['RT Colombia Claims Last 7'], '+','') }}{{ ((parseInt($json.data[1]['RT Colombia Claims Last 7']) - parseInt($json.data[0]['RT Colombia Claims Last 7']))/ parseInt($json.data[0]['RT Colombia Claims Last 7'])*100).toFixed(1)+'%'}} from last week)	  
			{{ $json.data[1]['RT Nigeria Claims Last 7'] }} Nigeria Claims Last 7 days ({{ $if($json.data[1]['RT Nigeria Claims Last 7'] >= $json.data[0]['RT Nigeria Claims Last 7'], '+','') }}{{ ((parseInt($json.data[1]['RT Nigeria Claims Last 7']) - parseInt($json.data[0]['RT Nigeria Claims Last 7']))/ parseInt($json.data[0]['RT Nigeria Claims Last 7'])*100).toFixed(1)+'%'}} from last week)
	  


*- Values -*
	G$ {{ $json.data[1]['RT Average Claim Value'] }} | USD {{ $json.data[1]['RT Average Claim Value USD'] }} Average Individual RT Claim Value this week ({{ $if($json.data[1]['RT Average Claim Value'] >= $json.data[0]['RT Average Claim Value'], '+','') }}{{ ((parseInt($json.data[1]['RT Average Claim Value']) - parseInt($json.data[0]['RT Average Claim Value']))/ parseInt($json.data[0]['RT Average Claim Value'])*100).toFixed(1)+'%'}} from last week)

*- Donations -*
	{{ $json.data[1]['RT All Donor Wallets'] }} Total Donor wallets ({{ $if($json.data[1]['RT All Donor Wallets'] >= $json.data[0]['RT All Donor Wallets'], '+','') }}{{ ((parseInt($json.data[1]['RT All Donor Wallets']) - parseInt($json.data[0]['RT All Donor Wallets']))/ parseInt($json.data[0]['RT All Donor Wallets'])*100).toFixed(1)+'%'}} from last week)

	G$ {{ $json.data[1]['RT All Pool Balance'].toLocaleString() }} | USD {{ $json.data[1]['RT All Pool Balance USD'] }} Combined RT Pools balance ({{ $if($json.data[1]['RT All Pool Balance'] >= $json.data[0]['RT All Pool Balance'], '+','') }}{{ ((parseInt($json.data[1]['RT All Pool Balance']) - parseInt($json.data[0]['RT All Pool Balance']))/ parseInt($json.data[0]['RT All Pool Balance'])*100).toFixed(1)+'%'}} from last week)	  
		G$ {{ $json.data[1]['RT Colombia Pool Balance'].toLocaleString() }} | USD {{ $json.data[1]['RT Colombia Pool Balance USD'] }}  RT Colombia Pool Balance ({{ $if($json.data[1]['RT Colombia Pool Balance'] >= $json.data[0]['RT Colombia Pool Balance'], '+','') }}{{ ((parseInt($json.data[1]['RT Colombia Pool Balance']) - parseInt($json.data[0]['RT Colombia Pool Balance']))/ parseInt($json.data[0]['RT Colombia Pool Balance'])*100).toFixed(1)+'%'}} from last week)	  
		G$ {{ $json.data[1]['RT Nigeria Pool Balance'].toLocaleString() }} | USD {{ $json.data[1]['RT Nigeria Pool Balance USD'] }} RT Nigeria Pool Balance ({{ $if($json.data[1]['RT Nigeria Pool Balance'] >= $json.data[0]['RT Nigeria Pool Balance'], '+','') }}{{ ((parseInt($json.data[1]['RT Nigeria Pool Balance']) - parseInt($json.data[0]['RT Nigeria Pool Balance']))/ parseInt($json.data[0]['RT Nigeria Pool Balance'])*100).toFixed(1)+'%'}} from last week)
